quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Your first objective is to make an attempt to go west. Following that, try to travel south. After that, head west. After that, make an attempt to take a trip north. With that done, attempt to travel west. With that done, make an attempt to take a trip west. And then, travel south. Then, travel east. Then, take the cucumber from the shelf. And then, eat the cucumber. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a closet. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can make out a shelf. [if there is something on the s_0]On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle. Let's see what's in here.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a canteen. A normal one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You've entered a cookery. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 Look over there! a counter. The counter is typical.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. An usual kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can make out a safe. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You are in a pantry. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna. The room is well lit.

 You can make out a formless locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The formless locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You're now in the kitchenette.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] ordinary looking case right there by you.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The case contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The case is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
Ah, the kitchen. This is some kind of kitchen, really great normal vibes in this place, a wonderful normal atmosphere. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You arrive in a shower. An usual kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a launderette.

 You make out a drawer.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_3]![end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You are in a cookhouse. A normal one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. A typical kind of place.

 Look over there! a chest. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've entered a scullery. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can see a box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. An ordinary one.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a bedchamber. The room is well lit.

 You can see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft style chest.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The Microsoft style chest contains [a list of things in the c_6]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Microsoft style chest is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You are in a vault. A standard one.

 [if c_7 is locked]A locked[else if c_7 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] type 9 box is right there by you.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The type 9 box contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The type 9 box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a coffer. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The coffer is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You are in a dish-pit. A typical kind of place.

 You make out a table. [if there is something on the s_2]On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You make out a platter! [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the platter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]However, the platter, like an empty platter, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: absurdly hot kitchen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a kitchen. An absurdly hot one.

 You can see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a board. Now why would someone leave that there? [if there is something on the s_4]On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: hatch
infos.desc: The hatch looks rugged. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it's an imposing door [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The formless locker looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cucumber
infos.desc: that's a typical cucumber!

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be a great idea if you could go west. With that over with, move south. Okay, and then, try to head west. With that done, move north. Then, travel west. After that, take a trip west. After that, go to the south. That done, attempt to travel east. If you can get through with that, take the cucumber from the shelf. If you can get your hands on the cucumber, eat the cucumber. Alright, thanks!
